name: Treasure Island
text: If this card is activated: Special Summon 1 "Treasure Hunter" monster from your hand or GY. If a "Treasure Hunter" monster you control is sent to the GY; set 1 "Treasure" Spell/Trap from your Deck to the Spell/Trap zone. All Explorer monsters you control gain 500 ATK. You can only activate "Treasure Island" once per turn.
